71a5('bum): med pa dang / sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
71a6('bum): rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
71a7('bum): phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
71b1('bum): pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
71b2('bum): bzhin med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa
71b3('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid
71b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mtha' las 'das
71b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la
71b6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
71b7('bum): med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po
72a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
72a2('bum): stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la
72a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / stobs rnams

72a6('bum): med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par

72b1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
72b2('bum): rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i

72b6('bum): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang byang
72b7('bum): chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad

73a2('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin

73a4('bum): dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /
73a5('bum): 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /mig la mig gi mtshan nyid med
73a6('bum): do| |rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /sna la sna'i mtshan nyid med do/ /lce la lce'i mtshan nyid med do/ /lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /gzugs

73b7('bum): ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus re reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus
74a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /

74b5('bum): pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan

75a5('bum): do| |stobs rnams la stobs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i

75a7('bum): rnams la tshad med pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams

75b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes

75b6('bum): nyid med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do/ /
75b7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /lam
76a1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /
76a2('bum): de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi
76a3('bum): mtshan nyid med do/ /chos nyid la chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi mtshan nyid
76a4('bum): med do| |chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do/ /mtshan nyid la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang
76a5('bum): bzhin med do/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di
76a6('bum): la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

81b5('bum): ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang /
81b6('bum): sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag
81b7('bum): dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /gti mug dang ldan
82a1('bum): pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems
82a2('bum): mi bskyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems
82a3('bum): mi bskyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor yug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song
82a4('bum): rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na
82a5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ tshe dang
82a6('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang / legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi btang
82a7('bum): bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar
82b1('bum): gyur pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga pa'o// //shes rab
82b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
82b3('bum): rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
82b4('bum): pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /
82b5('bum): gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
82b6('bum): pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi
82b7('bum): mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
82b 8('bum): pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
83a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
83a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub
83a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
83a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom
83a5('bum): ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
83a6('bum): spyod do| |bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar
83a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi dben
83b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba
83b2('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
83b3('bum): tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
83b4('bum): pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
83b5('bum): pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
83b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
83b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
84a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
84a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems
84a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang
84a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das
84a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan
84a6('bum): 'das| gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /
84a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
84b1('bum): la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
84b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bdag ces bgyi
84b3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bdag med
84b4('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes zhi
84b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes
84b6('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du
84b7('bum): shes dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
85a1('bum): pas 'du shes mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
85a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
85a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
85a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems

85b5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi
85b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi
85b7('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
86a1('bum): rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
86a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'
86a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
86a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /

86a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par
86b1('bum): shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas

86b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mig rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

87a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

88a7('bum): pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sna bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

88b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

90a3('bum): pas lus ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi

90a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lus mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
90a6('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
90a7('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
90b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

104b4('bum): ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi
104b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
104b6('bum): pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
104b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
105a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /
105a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi
105a3('bum): bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
105a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
105a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan
105a7('bum): ' das| gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar

105b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
105b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

105b6('bum): ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar
105b7('bum): spyod na| mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
106a1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /

106a4('bum): gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

111b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom
111b3('bum): ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /
111b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan
111b5('bum): ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar
111b6('bum): spyod na| mtshan ma spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag
111b7('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
112a1('bum): sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
112a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
112a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

118b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub
118b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan
118b7('bum): 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan
119a1('bum): ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas ming

126a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'

140a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang
140a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /
140a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar
140a5('bum): spyod na| mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin
140a6('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs
140a7('bum): mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

147a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /

154a2('bum): spyod na| mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams
154a3('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
154a4('bum): tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

154a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

161a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal

201a3('bum): shi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
201a4('bum): spyod| rga shi mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga
201a5('bum): shi mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
201a6('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal
201a7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes
201b1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar
201b2('bum): mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod
201b3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya
201b4('bum): bar mi spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag
201b5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
201b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims
201b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul

215a6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan
215a7('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya
215b1('bum): bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs

216b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /

220b3('bum): pa| bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs
220b4('bum): med| gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid

222a6('bum): khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med/ rna ba'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams/ rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa
222a7('bum): nyid do| |sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra'i khams med/ sgra'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
222b1('bum): nyid kyang sgra'i khams/ sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid

229a4('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags
229a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
229a6('bum): med de| stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin
229a7('bum): pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
229b1('bum): pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
229b2('bum): na'ang bsam gtan rnams med/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa
229b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa/
229b4('bum): tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
229b5('bum): gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
229b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
229b7('bum): gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med/ rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
230a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar
230a2('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
230a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
230a4('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
230a5('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
230a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
230a7('bum): mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med/ mngon par shes pa rnams
230b1('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting
230b2('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin
230b3('bum): rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/ gzungs kyi
230b4('bum): sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa
230b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
230b6('bum): rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i
230b7('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
231a1('bum): pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig
231a2('bum): pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
231a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
231a4('bum): na'ang byams pa chen po med/ byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ /byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /snying rje chen
231a5('bum): po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang snying rje
231a6('bum): chen po| |snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong
231a7('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
231b1('bum): ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
231b2('bum): na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
231b3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
231b4('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
231b5('bum): gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
231b6('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
232a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do/ /byang chub sems
232a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do/ /zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la/ mi
232a3('bum): spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de
232a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/
232a5('bum): spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
232a6('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dngos
232a7('bum): po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod do
232b1('bum): zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang
232b2('bum): ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te byang chub sems
232b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe
232b4('bum): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de'ang
232b5('bum): chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams
232b6('bum): cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba/ mchog tu bya ba/ tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i
232b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di
233a1('bum): 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/
233a2('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyad pas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
233a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang
233a4('bum): dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor
233a5('bum): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod
233a6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
233a7('bum): yod de| ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /seng+ge
233b1('bum): rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
233b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa
233b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
233b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
233b5('bum): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
233b6('bum): rgya'o| / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
233b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
234a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i
234a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
234a3('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na
234a4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
234a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge
234a6('bum): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
234a7('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur
234b1('bum): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i
234b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'jug pa
234b3('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
234b4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med
234b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
234b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
234b7('bum): nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
235a1('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ /brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de| ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla
235a2('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang
235a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting
235a4('bum): nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
235a5('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur
235a6('bum): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin
235a7('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /phyogs rnam par
235b1('bum): lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
235b2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na
235b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
235b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes
235b5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
235b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag
235b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
236a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
236a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
236a3('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na
236a4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par

249b5('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med
249b6('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog
249b7('bum): pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su byed par 'gyur ba med do/ /smras pa/
250a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de'ang med
250a2('bum): la| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med do/ /'du shes su 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
250a3('bum): 'byor la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /tshig 'di ni/ legs par bshad do/ /ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan
250a4('bum): thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni/ 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
250a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /tshul khrims
250a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la
250a7('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
250b1('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan rnams bslab par bya'o/ /tshad
250b2('bum): med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
250b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab
250b4('bum): par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
250b5('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
250b6('bum): 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
250b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /
251a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /tshul khrims
251a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs
251a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /dbang po rnams
251a4('bum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /'phags
251a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs
251a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /rnam
251a7('bum): par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
251b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la
251b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/ /
251b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
251b4('bum): gyis slob bo/ /snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
251b5('bum): stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi
251b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
251b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ dran
252a1('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul
252a2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ dbang po rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa
252a3('bum): yin| byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'phags
252a4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
252a5('bum): gyis slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa
252a6('bum): yin| mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
252a7('bum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa
252b1('bum): yin| gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la
252b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/
252b3('bum): snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bus gsol pa/
252b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /sems
252b5('bum): can mi dmigs so/ /'gro ba mi dmigs so/ /gso ba mi dmigs so/ /skyes bu mi dmigs so/ /gang zag mi dmigs so/ /shed can mi dmigs so/ /shed bdag mi dmigs so/ /
252b6('bum): byed pa po mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba po mi dmigs so/ /shes pa po mi dmigs so/ /mthong ba po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so/ /shin tu
252b7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
253a1('bum): dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba mi dmigs
253a2('bum): so| |shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus mi dmigs so/ /shin tu
253a3('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
253a4('bum): dag pa'i phyir dri mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
253a5('bum): chos mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam
253a6('bum): par dag pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra'i
253a7('bum): khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so/ /
253b1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i
253b2('bum): khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu
253b3('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg gi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes
253b4('bum): pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
253b5('bum): dag pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi
253b6('bum): dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir me'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rlung gi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nam
253b7('bum): mkha'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu
254a1('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
254a2('bum): ming dang gzugs mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched drug mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam
254a3('bum): par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sred pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir len pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
254a4('bum): dag pa'i phyir srid pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rga shi mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
254a5('bum): phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gog pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam
254a6('bum): par dag pa'i phyir lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs
254a7('bum): so| |shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
254b1('bum): dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus
254b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
254b3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu
254b4('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams mi
254b5('bum): dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so/ /
254b6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
254b7('bum): tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa/
255a1('bum): rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
255a2('bum): phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon bar shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /
255a3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de
255a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par
255a5('bum): rig pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam
255a6('bum): par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
255a7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu
255b1('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs
255b2('bum): so| |shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
255b3('bum): thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du
255b4('bum): bya ba med pa 'di ni/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin
255b5('bum): no| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
255b6('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos gang la'ang slob pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ chos 'di dag ni/ byis pa
255b7('bum): so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa
256a1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
256a2('bum): ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
256a3('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
256a4('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
256a5('bum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
256a6('bum): kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
256a7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
256b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
256b2('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
256b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
256b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
256b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /shA radwa/
256b6('bum): ti'i bu| 'du byed nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
256b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
257a1('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
