277a6('bum): par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi
277a7('bum): shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo / /'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mig mi shes mi
277b1('bum): mthong ngo / /rna ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sna mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lce mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lus mi shes mi mthong ngo / /yid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /
277b2('bum): sgra mi shes mi mthong ngo / /dri mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ro mi shes mi mthong ngo / /reg mi shes mi mthong ngo / /chos mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rna
277b3('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /
277b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /
277b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
277b6('bum): ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
277b7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sa'i khams
278a1('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo / /chu'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /me'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rlung gi khams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams mi shes mi
278a2('bum): mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ma rig pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ming dang
278a3('bum): gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /skye mched drug mi shes mi mthong ngo / /reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sred pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /len pa mi shes
278a4('bum): mi mthong ngo / /srid pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /skye ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rga shi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
278a5('bum): pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong
278a6('bum): ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes mthong ngo / /stong
278a7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /'dus bya stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
278b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
278b2('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mi dmigs pa
278b3('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
278b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /dbang po lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo //
278b5('bum): stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi
278b6('bum): shes mi mthong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshad med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /rnam par
278b7('bum): thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo / /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
279a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /snying rje chen po mi
279a2('bum): shes mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo / /
279a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /de ltar de dag ni/ byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gang nas 'byung ba ma yin
279a4('bum): zhe na| 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos kyi sa nas
279a5('bum): 'byung ba ma yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de dag ni/ yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches she na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
279a6('bum): ches so/ /tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
279a7('bum): so| |rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /
279b1('bum): sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
279b2('bum): so| |gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
279b3('bum): so| |reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi
279b4('bum): ches so| |rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lce'i
279b5('bum): rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /yid kyi rnam par
279b6('bum): shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna
279b7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas
280a1('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi
280a2('bum): 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /
280a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg
280a4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lus
280a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te
280a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar
280a7('bum): yid mi ches so/ /me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /nam mkha'i khams nam
280b1('bum): mkha'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /ma rig pa ma rig pas stong zhes
280b2('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so/ /'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /ming dang gzugs ming dang
280b3('bum): gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /reg pa reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /tshor ba tshor
280b4('bum): pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sred pa sred pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /len pa len pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /srid pa srid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi
280b5('bum): ches so| |skye ba skye bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rga shi rga shis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar
280b6('bum): yid mi ches so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong
280b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan
281a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /
281a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
281a3('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar
281a4('bum): yid mi ches so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
281a5('bum): ches so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes
281a6('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong
281a7('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong
281b1('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs
281b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong
281b3('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
281b4('bum): pa bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rdzu 'phrul
281b5('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes
281b6('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam
281b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /bsam gtan rnams
282a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /gzugs med
282a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong
282a3('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rnam
282a4('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /
282a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs
282a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /mi 'jigs pa
282a7('bum): bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /snying rje chen po snying
282b1('bum): rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rgyun du zhugs
282b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
282b3('bum): so| |phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rang byang chub rang
282b4('bum): byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa
282b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /de dag ni/ gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gtan pa ma yin/ tshul
282b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
282b7('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas
283a1('bum): pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus byas
283a2('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
283a3('bum): la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang gi
283a4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas
283a5('bum): pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ yang
283a6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin/
283a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam
283b1('bum): gtan rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas
283b2('bum): pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma
283b3('bum): yin| mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
283b4('bum): la gnas pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas
283b5('bum): pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni/ mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par
283b6('bum): zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la
283b7('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid la mngon par zhen
284a1('bum): pa yin| gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg la mngon
284a2('bum): par zhen pa yin/ chos la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
284a3('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i
284a4('bum): khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/
284a5('bum): ro'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg bya'i khams la mngon par
284a6('bum): zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi
284a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta
284b1('bum): ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ming dang gzugs
284b2('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched drug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sred pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/
284b3('bum): len pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ srid pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rga shi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
284b4('bum): zhen pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen
284b5('bum): pa yin| bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi stong pa
284b6('bum): nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ don
284b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
285a1('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang bzhin stong
285a2('bum): pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
285a3('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon
285a4('bum): par zhen pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa
285a5('bum): yin| dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stobs rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
285a6('bum): lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mngon
285a7('bum): par zhen pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
285b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la
285b2('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par
285b3('bum): zhen pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje
285b4('bum): chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan gcig phyir
285b5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par
285b6('bum): zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
285b7('bum): chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
286a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar
286a2('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
286a3('bum): 'das| ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/
286a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags
286a5('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i
286a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon
286a7('bum): par zhen/ nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa
286b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong
286b2('bum): pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang
286b3('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chos
286b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par
286b5('bum): zhen| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags
286b6('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
286b7('bum): rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
287a1('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags
287a2('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
287a3('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
287a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ting
287a5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par
287a6('bum): zhen| mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par
287a7('bum): zhen| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
287b1('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
287b2('bum): chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags na/ byang
287b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
287b4('bum): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi
287b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam
287b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
287b7('bum): tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
288a1('bum): de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
288a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a4('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a6('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
288a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
288b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
288b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // //shes rab kyi
288b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi bcu pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing
288b4('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
288b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
288b6('bum): su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
288b7('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
289a1('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
289a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang
289a3('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
289a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
289a5('bum): su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
289a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
289a7('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
289b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
289b2('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
289b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang
289b4('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
289b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
289b6('bum): nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
289b7('bum): ba'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe thog ma
290a1('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
290a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba
290a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
290a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290a5('bum): chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
290a7('bum): dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
290b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
290b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
290b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang
290b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
290b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
290b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
290b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
291a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang
291a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/
291a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
291a4('bum): mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
291a5('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang
291a6('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
291a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs
291b1('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
291b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs
291b3('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
291b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag
291b5('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
291b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe stobs de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
291b7('bum): ste| shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
292a1('bum): 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag de dag
292a2('bum): mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
292a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i
292a4('bum): tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
292a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292a6('bum): chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
292a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang
292b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
292b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
292b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
292b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
292b5('bum): dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa
292b6('bum): ti'i bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA
292b7('bum): radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa
293a1('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
293a2('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
293a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
293a4('bum): ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
293a5('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par
293a6('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
293a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang
293b1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
293b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su
293b3('bum): mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
293b4('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
293b5('bum): mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
293b6('bum): 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing
293b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
294a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de
294a2('bum): dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
294a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag
294a4('bum): par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob
294a5('bum): pa ni| mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen
294a6('bum): po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi
294a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i
294b1('bum): tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
294b2('bum): ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i
294b3('bum): tshe thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
294b4('bum): slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod
294b5('bum): pa'i tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
294b6('bum): la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
294b7('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
295a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
295a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
295a3('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
295a4('bum): pa| nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
295a5('bum): tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus
295a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba
295a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan
295b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi
295b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
295b3('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di
295b4('bum): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
295b5('bum): thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad ces 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes
295b6('bum): bu 'di| bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
295b7('bum): mchi na| bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
296a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi
296a2('bum): na| bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
296a3('bum): pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri
296a4('bum): ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams
296a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
296a6('bum): bgyi| bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
296a7('bum): ram| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig
296b1('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram
296b2('bum): zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab
296b3('bum): cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan
296b4('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
296b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du
296b6('bum): 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
296b7('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ chen po stong pa
297a1('bum): nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan
297a2('bum): 'das| de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa
297a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
297a4('bum): bgyi| bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhig/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
297a5('bum): ram| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig
297a6('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
297a7('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i
297b1('bum): skyes bu 'di/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi
297b2('bum): na| bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
297b3('bum): nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la
297b4('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
297b5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la
297b6('bum): la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
297b7('bum): thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/
298a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
298a2('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rang gi mtshan
298a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
298a4('bum): skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams
298a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
298a6('bum): bgyi| bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
298a7('bum): ram| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di
298b1('bum): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
298b2('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dngos po med
298b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan
298b4('bum): 'das| de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab cing
298b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
298b6('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
298b7('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bar 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la
299a1('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram
299a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad
299a3('bum): du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dbang po rnams la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur

299a6('bum): du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab cing rnam pa

299b1('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung

300a1('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
300a2('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig

300a4('bum): par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/

300a7('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par

305a5('bum): rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ reg pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
305a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom
305a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sred pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags
305b1('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ len pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
305b2('bum): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ srid pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
305b3('bum): de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
305b4('bum): 'das| de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
305b5('bum): 'das| de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/
305b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang
305b7('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
306a1('bum): gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
306a2('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
306a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
306a4('bum): lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam
306a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig
306a6('bum): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu
306a7('bum): ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
306b1('bum): kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ stong
306b2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji
306b3('bum): snyam du sems/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
306b4('bum): 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
306b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /
306b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
306b7('bum): 'das| de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin
307a1('bum): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ thog ma dang tha
307a2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
307a3('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
307a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags
307a5('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/
307a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
307a7('bum): zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mi dmigs pa stong pa
307b1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du
307b2('bum): sems| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
307b3('bum): pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan

307b5('bum): 'das| de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin
307b6('bum): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/

308a1('bum): rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
308a2('bum): stsal pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom

308a6('bum): la| sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/

308b1('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan

308b3('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin

308b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
308b7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa
309a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/
309a2('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ ting nge 'dzin
309a3('bum): rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam
309a4('bum): du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
