309a7('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu
309b1('bum): ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po'ang
309b2('bum): gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sangs
309b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
309b4('bum): rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so// //shes rab kyi
309b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
309b6('bum): gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /
309b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed kyang gzhan ma
310a1('bum): lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/
310a2('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
310a3('bum): lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna
310a4('bum): ba'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ sna'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lce'ang gzhan ma lags/
310a5('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma/
310a6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs
310a7('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgra'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
310b1('bum): lags te/ sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sgra'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dri'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o/ /bcom ldan
310b2('bum): 'das| ro'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ reg kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
310b3('bum): te| reg nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/ /bcom
310b4('bum): ldan 'das/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
310b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//
310b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom
310b7('bum): ldan 'das/ lce'i rnam par shes ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan
311a1('bum): 'das| lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi
311a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid
311a3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
311a4('bum): kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
311a5('bum): kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
311a6('bum): kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
311a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
311b1('bum): kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
311b2('bum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
311b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma
311b4('bum): lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan
311b5('bum): 'das| sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
311b6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg
311b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags
312a1('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom
312a2('bum): ldan 'das/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
312a3('bum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
312a4('bum): kyang sa'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /bcom
312a5('bum): ldan 'das/ me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rlung gi khams
312a6('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma
312a7('bum): lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma
312b1('bum): lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma lags/
312b2('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed
312b3('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
312b4('bum): kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs
312b5('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ bcom ldan 'das/ reg pa'ang
312b6('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
312b7('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sred pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /
313a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ len pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ srid
313a2('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skye ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
313a3('bum): lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rga shi'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
313a4('bum): rga shi'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i
313a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
313a6('bum): ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
313a7('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus
313b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
313b2('bum): lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma
313b3('bum): lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
313b4('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
313b5('bum): ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa
313b6('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
313b7('bum): ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
314a1('bum): kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
314a2('bum): ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
314a3('bum): ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
314a4('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
314a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
314a6('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dor ba med pa stong pa
314a7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin
314b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad stong
314b2('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi mtshan
314b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
314b4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan
314b5('bum): 'das| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom
314b6('bum): ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
314b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
315a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid
315a2('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par
315a3('bum): spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu
315a4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid
315a5('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs
315a6('bum): rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang
315a7('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
315b1('bum): lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
315b2('bum): ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang
315b3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
315b4('bum): te| tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
315b5('bum): lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang
315b6('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
315b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
316a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
316a2('bum): ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
316a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu
316a4('bum): ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
316a5('bum): ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
316a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
316a7('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
316b1('bum): mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ so so
316b2('bum): yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ snying
316b3('bum): rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs
316b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
316b5('bum): ma lags te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/
316b6('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang
316b7('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan
317a1('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang byang chub kyang
317a2('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
317a3('bum): lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
317a4('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das
317a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
317a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom
317a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes
317b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
317b2('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
317b3('bum): dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
317b4('bum): rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga bo skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/
317b5('bum): rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la
317b6('bum): 'du shes med cing / brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag
317b7('bum): med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de
318a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol
318a2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
318a3('bum): bslab cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du
318a4('bum): gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang
318a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go /
318a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
318a7('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni/ dngos po ma mchis
318b1('bum): ba'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po
318b2('bum): lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
318b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
318b4('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
318b5('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar sgyu ma ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs
318b6('bum): su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams

325b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
325b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
325b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mi rtag pa'i
326a1('bum): rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/
326a2('bum): de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
326a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
326a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
326a5('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
326a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
326a7('bum): shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog
326b1('bum): par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab
326b2('bum): 'byor| 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
326b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs
326b4('bum): so| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
326b5('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog bar byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam
326b6('bum): par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /
326b7('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
327a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par
327a2('bum): rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
327a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
327a4('bum): byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de
327a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
327a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed
327a7('bum): de| de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtog bar byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
327b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong pa'i rnam

327b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi

328a1('bum): rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs

328a3('bum): yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med pa'i rnam

328a6('bum): yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
328a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
328b2('bum): tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
328b3('bum): rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs
328b4('bum): so| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang

328b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i
329a1('bum): rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/
329a2('bum): de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/
329a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam
329a4('bum): po bzhi bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de
329a5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
329a6('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs
329a7('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs mngon par 'du bya
329b1('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
329b2('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /
329b3('bum): tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
329b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
329b5('bum): bstan to/ /tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes sdug bsngal zhes
329b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
329b7('bum): gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du
330a1('bum): shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
330a2('bum): chos bstan to/ /'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed sdug

330a6('bum): 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa sdug

330b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi

330b3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul byis chos bstan to snyam mo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
330b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
330b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par
330b6('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
330b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
331a1('bum): yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
331a2('bum): gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /

331a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
331a5('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
331a6('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
331a7('bum): mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba
331b1('bum): gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang bdag med pa'i rnam
331b2('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs

331b4('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

331b6('bum): pas| tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor
331b7('bum): ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par

332a2('bum): rnam bar yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la

332a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid

332b1('bum): ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du

332b5('bum): yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang
332b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
332b7('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
333a1('bum): pas| 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
333a2('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
333a3('bum): ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
333a4('bum): rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam
333a5('bum): par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes
333a6('bum): pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i
333a7('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
333b1('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la
333b2('bum): byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed
333b3('bum): pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
333b4('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa'
333b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos
333b6('bum): de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa
333b7('bum): med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
334a1('bum): po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
334a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
334a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
334a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
334a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar
334a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
334a7('bum): rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
334b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
334b2('bum): gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
334b3('bum): gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad
334b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
334b5('bum): tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
334b6('bum): rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
334b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor
335a1('bum): ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor
335a2('bum): ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

336b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
336b4('bum): pa ste| de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
336b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing
336b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

337a2('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs

339b4('bum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams
339b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
339b6('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam
339b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
340a1('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
340a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
340a3('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
340a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan
340a5('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
340a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
340a7('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
340b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba
340b2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
340b3('bum): gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
340b4('bum): shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba
340b5('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
340b6('bum): bas| 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs
340b7('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
341a1('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang

341b1('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

346a1('bum): nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong

346a6('bum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid

353b1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

353b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
353b4('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
353b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
353b6('bum): gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
353b7('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
354a1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
354a2('bum): 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
354a3('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
354a4('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
354a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
354a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
354a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
354b1('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
354b2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
354b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes
354b4('bum): pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
354b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon
354b6('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
354b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
355a1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
355a2('bum): 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
355a3('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i

355a5('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
355a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes
355a7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
355b1('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
355b2('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i

355b4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
355b5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
355b6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
355b7('bum): du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
356a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
356a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
356a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
356a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de mi

356a6('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
356a7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
356b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
356b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
356b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

356b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

357a4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas

357b1('bum): de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
357b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
357b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
357b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab
357b5('bum): 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
357b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba zhi zhes bya
357b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
358a1('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
358a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

358a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi

358a7('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par

360b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
360b5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
360b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
360b7('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
361a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
361a2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
361a3('bum): sna dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
361a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa

361b2('bum): gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
361b3('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sgra mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang

361b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /

362a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos mi rtag ces bya bar
362a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs

367a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
367a7('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

367b2('bum): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
367b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
367b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
367b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
367b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
367b7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
368a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
368a2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes
368a3('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
368a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
368a5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes
368a6('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
368a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi
368b1('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
368b2('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i

368b5('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
368b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
368b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
369a1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
369a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
369a3('bum): brgya pa| bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes

370b1('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

373a1('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

373a3('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
373a4('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

375a1('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
375a2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
375a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
375a4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes
375a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
375a6('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
375a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
375b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
375b2('bum): de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
375b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
375b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
375b5('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
375b6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
375b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te
376a1('bum): reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
376a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
376a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
376a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
376a5('bum): pa'o| |gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
376a6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
376a7('bum): gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
376b1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
376b2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i
376b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
376b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
376b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med
376b6('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
376b7('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
377a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
377a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
377a3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med
377a4('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
377a5('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
377a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
377a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
377b1('bum): pa'o| / gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
377b2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
377b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
377b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
377b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te
377b6('bum): reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
377b7('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
378a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
378a2('bum): gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
378a3('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
378a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
378a5('bum): pa'o| |gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
378a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
378a7('bum): dag ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
378b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
378b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i
378b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
378b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
378b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
