378b7('bum): pa'o| |gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
379a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
379a2('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
379a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
379a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
379a5('bum): pa'o| / gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
379a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
379a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
379b1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
379b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
379b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
379b4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes
379b5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
379b6('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
379b7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
380a1('bum): tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
380a2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
380a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
380a4('bum): de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
380a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
380a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
380a7('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung
380b1('bum): ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
380b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
380b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa
380b4('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
380b5('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
380b6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi
380b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
381a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med
381a2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
381a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa
381a4('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
381a5('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
381a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
381a7('bum): la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
381b1('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
381b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
381b3('bum): gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
381b4('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
381b5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab
381b6('bum): 'byor| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
381b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
382a1('bum): pa'o| |gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
382a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba stong
382a3('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
382a4('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
382a5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
382a6('bum): tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
382a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
382b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
382b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
382b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
382b4('bum): la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
382b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar
382b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
382b7('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
383a1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus
383a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
383a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
383a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
383a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
383a6('bum): ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
383a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
383b1('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i
383b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
383b3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
383b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
383b5('bum): de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
383b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya
383b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
384a1('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus
384a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
384a3('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
384a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
384a5('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
384a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus
384a7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
384b1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
384b2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
384b3('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
384b4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
384b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
384b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
384b7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
385a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
385a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
385a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
385a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
385a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
385a6('bum): de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
385a7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
385b1('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
385b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
385b3('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
385b4('bum): pa'o| |gang de la me'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
385b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
385b6('bum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la nam mkha'i khams
385b7('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
386a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
386a2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
386a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
386a4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams sdug
386a5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
386a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la me'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
386a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams sdug bsngal
386b1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
386b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
386b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal
386b4('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
386b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams
386b6('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
386b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
387a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la me'i
387a2('bum): khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
387a3('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
387a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la nam mkha'i
387a5('bum): khams bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
387a6('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
387a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
387b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
387b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams
387b3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
387b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la me'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
387b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
387b6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
387b7('bum): pa'o| |gang de la nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
388a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
388a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
388a3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
388a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
388a5('bum): ba'o| |gang de la chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
388a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la me'i khams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
388a7('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams stong
388b1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
388b2('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
388b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar de mi
388b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs bar nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
388b5('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar
388b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
388b7('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
389a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la me'i khams mtshan ma med ces
389a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
389a3('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
389a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya
389a5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
389a6('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
389a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
389b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
389b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
389b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
389b4('bum): pa'o| |gang de la me'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
389b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rlung gi khams smon pa med cing bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
389b6('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la nam mkha'i khams
389b7('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
390a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
390a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab

390a5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chu'i khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
390a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la me'i khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

390b6('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

396a5('bum): pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/

396b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
396b2('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
396b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
396b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
396b5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon
396b6('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
396b7('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
397a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha
397a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
397a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
397a4('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
397a5('bum): pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
397a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol
397a7('bum): tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
397b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
397b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
397b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
397b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
397b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
397b6('bum): gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
397b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
398a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
398a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
398a3('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
398a4('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
398a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes
398a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
398a7('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
398b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi
398b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
398b3('bum): pa'o| |gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
398b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
398b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
398b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
398b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmig
399a1('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
399a2('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
399a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong ba nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
399a4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
399a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
399a6('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
399a7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
399b1('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
399b2('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
399b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
399b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
399b5('bum): gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
399b6('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
399b7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag
400a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
400a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
400a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
400a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
400a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
400a6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

400b1('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
400b2('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa
400b3('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
400b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang

400b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
401a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong ba nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
401a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
401a3('bum): gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
401a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
401a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas
401a6('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
401a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
401b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug
401b2('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
401b3('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
401b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya
401b5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
401b6('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong ba nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
401b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
402a1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
402a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
402a3('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
402a4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
402a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
402a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
402a7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
402b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag
402b2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
402b3('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
402b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
402b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
402b6('bum): gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
402b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
403a1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
403a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
403a3('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
403a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong
403a5('bum): pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
403a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
403a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang
403b1('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am
403b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
403b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de
403b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
403b5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
403b6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
403b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
404a1('bum): de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
404a2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
404a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
404a4('bum): pa'o| |gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
404a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
404a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
404a7('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
404b1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong
404b2('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
404b3('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
404b4('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
404b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes
404b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
404b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
405a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
405a2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
405a3('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
405a4('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
405a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha
405a6('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
405a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
405b1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
405b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
405b3('bum): gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
405b4('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
405b5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyam thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes
405b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
405b7('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
406a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
406a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
406a3('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
406a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
406a5('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
406a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

406b1('bum): de la phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/

406b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs

406b6('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang

407a2('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
407a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
407a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
407a5('bum): gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
407a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
407a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams
407b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
407b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
407b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
407b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po
407b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
407b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

408b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
408b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med

408b4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
408b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

409a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
409a2('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
409a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

409a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
