409b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
409b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
409b3('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan
409b4('bum): ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
409b5('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
409b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar
409b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
410a1('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid smon pa med
410a2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
410a3('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
410a4('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
410a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong
410a6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
410a7('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
410b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces
410b2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
410b3('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
410b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
410b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong
410b6('bum): pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
410b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
411a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa
411a2('bum): stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
411a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
411a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon
411a5('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
411a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
411a7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon
411b1('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
411b2('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
411b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
411b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
411b5('bum): pa'o| |gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
411b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
411b7('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
412a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba
412a2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
412a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
412a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par
412a5('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
412a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
412a7('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
412b1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
412b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
412b3('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
412b4('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
412b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
412b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang
412b7('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
413a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med
413a2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
413a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
413a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid
413a5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
413a6('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
413a7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
413b1('bum): gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
413b2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
413b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
413b4('bum): pa'o| |gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
413b5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
413b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
413b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi
414a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
414a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
414a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
414a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
414a5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
414a6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
414a7('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
414b1('bum): de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
414b2('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
414b3('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
414b4('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
414b5('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
414b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid
414b7('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
415a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
415a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong
415a3('bum): pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
415a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
415a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
415a6('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
415a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
415b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar
415b2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
415b3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
415b4('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
415b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
415b6('bum): pa'o| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
415b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
416a1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
416a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
416a3('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
416a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
416a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
416a6('bum): rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
416a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
416b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
416b2('bum): rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
416b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
416b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye
416b5('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
416b6('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
416b7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag
417a1('bum): par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
417a2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
417a3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang
417a4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
417a5('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
417a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par
417a7('bum): spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
417b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
417b2('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med
417b3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
417b4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
417b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya
417b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
417b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
418a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston
418a2('bum): phrag brgya ba/ bam po zhe drug pa/ gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
418a3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal
418a4('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
418a5('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
418a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi
418a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
418b1('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
418b2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
418b3('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
418b4('bum): la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
418b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
418b6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
418b7('bum): la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
419a1('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
419a2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
419a3('bum): gang de la dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
419a4('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
419a5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams bdag
419a6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
419a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
419b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
419b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
419b3('bum): de la dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
419b4('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
419b5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba
419b6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
419b7('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
420a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi
420a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
420a3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
420a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
420a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs
420a6('bum): rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
420a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
420b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
420b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
420b3('bum): stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
420b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
420b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
420b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
420b7('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
421a1('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
421a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
421a3('bum): la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
421a4('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
421a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang
421a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
421a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
421b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan
421b2('bum): lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
421b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
421b4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
421b5('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
421b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon pa 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
421b7('bum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag
422a1('bum): rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
422a2('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
422a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i
422a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
422a5('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
422a6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
422a7('bum): la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
422b1('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
422b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags
422b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
422b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
422b5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan
422b6('bum): lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
422b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
423a1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
423a2('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
423a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i
423a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
423a5('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
423a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
423a7('bum): gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
423b1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

423b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
423b4('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

424a6('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
424a7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam
424b1('bum): gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
424b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

424b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
424b5('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
424b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
424b7('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam
425a1('bum): gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
425a2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
425a3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
425a4('bum): de la bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
425a5('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
425a6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams
425a7('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
425b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
425b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
425b3('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
425b4('bum): la tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
425b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
425b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
425b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
426a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
426a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
426a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
426a4('bum): gang de la tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
426a5('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
426a6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
426a7('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
426b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
426b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms
426b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
426b4('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
426b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i
426b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
426b7('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
427a1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
427a2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
427a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
427a4('bum): rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
427a5('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
427a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
427a7('bum): pa'o| |gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
427b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
427b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
427b3('bum): de la rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
427b4('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
427b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams
427b6('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
427b7('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
428a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med
428a2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
428a3('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
428a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
428a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
428a6('bum): pa'o| |gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
428a7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
428b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i
428b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
428b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
428b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i
428b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
428b6('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
428b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas
429a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
429a2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de
429a3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
429a4('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
429a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
429a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
429a7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
429b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
429b2('bum): de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
429b3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi rtag ces
429b4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
429b5('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
429b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i
429b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
430a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
430a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
430a3('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar de
430a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
430a5('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
430a6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
430a7('bum): gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
430b1('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
430b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
430b3('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
430b4('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
430b5('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
430b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes
430b7('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
431a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
431a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams
431a3('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
431a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
431a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar
431a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
431a7('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
431b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
431b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
431b3('bum): gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
431b4('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
431b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mngon
431b6('bum): par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
431b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
432a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal
432a2('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
432a3('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
432a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
432a5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
432a6('bum): gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
432a7('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
432b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams
432b2('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
432b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
432b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya
432b5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
432b6('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
432b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
433a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
433a2('bum): pa'o| |gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
433a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
433a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi
433a5('bum): sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
433a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
433a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma
433b1('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
433b2('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
433b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
433b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
433b5('bum): gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
433b6('bum): sa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
433b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
434a1('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
434a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin gshegs
434a3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
434a4('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
434a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin
434a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
434a7('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
434b1('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin
434b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
434b3('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

434b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
434b6('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

435a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
435a2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
435a3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi
435a4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
435a5('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa

435a7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
435b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad

436a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi rtag
436a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi

436a7('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
436b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar

436b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs bar nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi

437a5('bum): la snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi

437b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor

438a4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de

438a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
438b1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
438b2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
