438b4('bum): la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
438b5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
438b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
438b7('bum): gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
439a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya
439a2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
439a3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
439a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir de mi
439a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
439a6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
439a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po zhe bdun pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di
439b1('bum): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
439b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
439b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs
439b4('bum): po'i lag tu lhung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
439b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha
439b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems sa byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam
439b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs
440a1('bum): te| brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
440a2('bum): pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
440a3('bum): phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sbyin pa'i pha rol
440a4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
440a5('bum): la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
440a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
440a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
440b1('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
440b2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
440b3('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
440b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
440b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
440b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
440b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
441a1('bum): ba med par gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
441a2('bum): byed do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
441a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
441a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
441a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs thog ma dang
441a6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
441a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
441b1('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
441b2('bum): la bya ba med par gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
441b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
441b4('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
441b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
441b6('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
441b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
442a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
442a2('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs ngo bo nyid
442a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
442a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
442a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
442a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
442a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
442b1('bum): la bya ba med par tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
442b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
442b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
442b4('bum): la bya ba med par tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
442b5('bum): do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
442b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
442b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
443a1('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba 'dus byas
443a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
443a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
443a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
443a5('bum): bya ba med par tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
443a6('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya
443a7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
443b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa
443b2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor
443b3('bum): ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
443b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
443b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
443b6('bum): med par tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
443b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
444a1('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
444a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
444a3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa
444a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
444a5('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
444a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi
444a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
444b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
444b2('bum): med par 'du shes phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
444b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa
444b4('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du
444b5('bum): shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
444b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
444b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
445a1('bum): 'du shes don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
445a2('bum): do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'dus shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
445a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
445a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
445a5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes mtha' las 'das pa stong
445a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
445a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
445b1('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
445b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
445b3('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
445b4('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
445b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
445b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes rang gi mtshan
445b7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
446a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
446a2('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
446a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
446a4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
446a5('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
446a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du shes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
446a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
446b1('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
446b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
446b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
446b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
446b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
446b6('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
446b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
447a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
447a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
447a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
447a4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar
447a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
447a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong
447a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
447b1('bum): ba med par 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
447b2('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
447b3('bum): byed de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
447b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
447b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes
447b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
447b7('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
448a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
448a2('bum): yid la bya ba med par 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
448a3('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

448a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
448a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dngos po med
448a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab
448b1('bum): ' byor| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par
448b2('bum): shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

448b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes
448b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams

448b7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa chen po stong
449a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
449a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
449a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

449a5('bum): b yed do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid

449b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
449b2('bum): med par rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

449b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
449b6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa chos thams cad

450a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
450a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

450a4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par rnam par shes pa dngos po
450a5('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

450b1('bum): rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed

450b3('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

450b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
451a1('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig chen po stong pa zhes bya bar

451b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
451b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha
451b3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

451b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
451b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

452a1('bum): d o| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
452a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
452a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
452a4('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig dngos po med
452a5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
452a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
452a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
452b1('bum): par mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
452b2('bum): do| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
452b3('bum): rna ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
452b4('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
452b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
452b6('bum): byed de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
452b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
453a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba chen po stong pa zhes
453a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
453a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
453a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes
453a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
453a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
453a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
453b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
453b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
453b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
453b4('bum): rna ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
453b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin
453b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
453b7('bum): ba med par rna ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
454a1('bum): d o| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
454a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
454a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
454a4('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba
454a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
454a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
454a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
454b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par rna ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
454b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
454b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
454b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
454b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna phyi nang stong
454b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
454b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
455a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
455a2('bum): par sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
455a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong
455a4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
455a5('bum): par sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
455a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
455a7('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
455b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
455b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar

455b5('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna rang bzhin stong pa
455b6('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
455b7('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
456a1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
456a2('bum): bya ba med par sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
456a3('bum): do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
456a4('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
456a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
456a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

457a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

457b3('bum): med par lce thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

457b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

458a3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
458a4('bum): lce mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
458a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
458a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
458a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
458b1('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

458b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

459a2('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

459a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes

459a7('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong
459b1('bum): ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
459b2('bum): par lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
459b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
459b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
459b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
459b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
459b7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
460a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa
460a2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
460a3('bum): par lus rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
460a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
460a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
460a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
460a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus ngo bo nyid stong pa
460b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
460b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
460b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po zhe brgyad pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan
460b4('bum): y ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid nang stong pa zhes
460b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
460b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
460b7('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
461a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
461a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
461a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid chen po stong pa
461a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

461a6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid
461a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
461b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma
461b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
461b3('bum): med par yid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

461b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

466a7('bum): do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

466b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
466b3('bum): do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
466b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
466b5('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
466b6('bum): gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
466b7('bum): bya ba med par dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
467a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong
467a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
467a3('bum): dri stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
467a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
467a5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri don dam
467a6('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
467a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
467b1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri 'dus ma byas
467b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
467b3('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
467b4('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri thog
467b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
467b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
467b7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
468a1('bum): la bya ba med par dri rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
468a2('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
468a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
468a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
468a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri mi dmigs pa
468a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
468a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
468b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
468b2('bum): med par dri ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
468b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
468b4('bum): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
468b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
468b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
468b7('bum): ba med par ro phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
469a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
469a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
469a3('bum): la bya ba med par ro stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /

469a5('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
469a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
469a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar
469b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
469b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
469b3('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro mtha' las 'das pa stong
469b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
469b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
469b6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
469b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
470a1('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
470a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
470a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
470a4('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro rang gi mtshan
470a5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
470a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ro mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs
470a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

470b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par reg nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de

471a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par reg phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

471b6('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha

472a1('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

472a6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par

473a1('bum): ba med par chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de

473a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
473b1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos 'dus byas stong pa zhes
473b2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
473b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
473b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos mtha' las 'das
473b5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
473b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
473b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
474a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
474a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos rang bzhin
474a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
474a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

474a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa

474b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

480a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
480b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
480b2('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
480b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
480b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par
480b5('bum): shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
480b6('bum): r ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
480b7('bum): de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
481a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
481a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
481a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa
481a4('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
481a5('bum): bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
481a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa
481a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
481b1('bum): p ha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
481b2('bum): de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
481b3('bum): s ems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya
481b4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
481b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
481b6('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam
481b7('bum): par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
482a1('bum): p ha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
482a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

482a7('bum): rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
482b1('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar

487b2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
487b3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos
487b4('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
487b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
487b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
487b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs
488a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
488a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa
488a3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
488a4('bum): bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
488a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos
488a6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
488a7('bum): su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
488b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
488b2('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya
488b3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa

493b7('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
494a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
