494a7('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
494b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
494b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
494b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong
494b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
494b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo
494b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
494b7('bum): la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
495a1('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
495a2('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
495a3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
495a4('bum): par lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
495a5('bum): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
495a6('bum): de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
495a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
495b1('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
495b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes

495b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
495b6('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus
495b7('bum): te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
496a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las
496a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
496a3('bum): r ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya
496a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
496a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

496a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
496b1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
496b2('bum): med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

497a5('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga bcu pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

501a6('bum): med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
501a7('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa
501b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
501b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
501b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
501b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
501b5('bum): gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
501b6('bum): ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
501b7('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong
502a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
502a2('bum): p ha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
502a3('bum): byed de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
502a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
502a5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi
502a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
502a7('bum): b yed do| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas
502b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
502b2('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
502b3('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
502b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
502b5('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg
502b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
502b7('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor
503a1('bum): ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
503a2('bum): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
503a3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
503a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
503a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
503a6('bum): la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
503a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

507b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
507b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
508a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te
508a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
508a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
508a4('bum): de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
508a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
508a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
508a7('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
508b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
508b2('bum): par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
508b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
508b4('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
508b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
508b6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i
508b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
509a1('bum): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong
509a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
509a3('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
509a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
509a5('bum): med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
509a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
509a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
509b1('bum): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya
509b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
509b3('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
509b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
509b5('bum): bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
509b6('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams
509b7('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
510a1('bum): p a la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
510a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
510a3('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
510a4('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
510a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
510a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
510a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab

510b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
510b3('bum): p o de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

510b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
511a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

511b5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
511b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

512a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
512a4('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid
512a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
512a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

512b3('bum): ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

512b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
513a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

513b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
513b7('bum): r ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
514a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
514a2('bum): r ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
514a3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
514a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
514a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
514a6('bum): ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
514a7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg
514b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
514b2('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa
514b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
514b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong
514b5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi
514b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
514b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
515a1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
515a2('bum): su byed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
515a3('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
515a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
515a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
515a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
515a7('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
515b1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
515b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
515b3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams don dam pa stong
515b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
515b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
515b6('bum): sems su byed de/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
515b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
516a1('bum): yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
516a2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa
516a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
516a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa
516a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
516a6('bum): par sa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
516a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
516b1('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
516b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
516b3('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar
516b4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam
516b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
516b6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i
516b7('bum): khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
517a1('bum): r ol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
517a2('bum): byed de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
517a3('bum): s ems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
517a4('bum): de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
517a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

518a2('bum): chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

518a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

518b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

519a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
519a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
519a3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam

519b2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad

519b5('bum): yid la byed do/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa

519b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams
520a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
520a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
520a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
520a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma
520a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
520a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
520a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
520b1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
520b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
520b3('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams
520b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
520b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
520b6('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
520b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
521a1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams ngo bo nyid
521a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
521a3('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par me'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i
521a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
521a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
521a6('bum): la| stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams phyi stong pa
521a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa
521b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
521b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

521b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

522a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
522a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
522a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
522a4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma
522a5('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
522a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rlung gi khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

522b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

527b7('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
528a1('bum): la bya ba med par ma rig pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
528a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
528a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
528a4('bum): ba med par ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
528a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
528a6('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
528a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
528b1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
528b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
528b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
528b4('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa rang
528b5('bum): bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
528b6('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
528b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa
529a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
529a2('bum): do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
529a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
529a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
529a5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

529b1('bum): nyid kyis dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa

529b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
529b5('bum): med par 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

533a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam

533a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa ngo bo

533b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
533b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi
533b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa
533b4('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang
533b5('bum): gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
533b6('bum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
533b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
534a1('bum): ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /

534a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs
534a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

534a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes
534a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
534b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
534b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
534b3('bum): byed de| dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
534b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
534b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
534b6('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
534b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
535a1('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
535a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
535a3('bum): ba med par ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
535a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
535a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
535a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
535a7('bum): ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed de// //
